name: XS Moto
overview: International motorcycle racing glides onto the PlayStation with 22 circuits from around the globe and four gameplay modes: Single Race, Championship, 2-Player Race, and 2-Player Championship. Competing in Championship mode will unlock ten of the 22 tracks, depending on the difficulty selected (novice, amateur, or professional), but additional Skill Tests must be completed successfully to allow access to the extra tracks and gameplay at higher difficulty levels. The criteria for the difficulty settings include steering and braking assistance as well as the amount of damage sustained.
